name: GLS Pay
author: Eligma Ltd.

sections.description:
By integrating the GLS Pay extension, you can benefit from comprehensive payment orchestration services that combine multiple payment methods and parcel deliveries in one holistic solution. Offer your customers a wide selection of payment methods – from all major payment cards, digital payments and cryptocurrency payments by GoCrypto and top it off with delivery services by GLS.

The wide range of payment options included in the GLS Pay plugin gives you access to a large customer base. Card payments attract traditional users, while digital and cryptocurrency payments open up your online store to over 40M users from all over the world. All while benefiting from competitive transaction prices.

The entire payment orchestration provides secure services and complies with all relevant ISO standards and mandatory regulations.

Web Payments API Support

GLS Pay includes Web Payments API support, which means customers can pay using payment details associated to their mobile devices, in browsers supporting the Web Payments API (Chrome for Android, amongst others).
sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you donâ€™t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic installation of the GLS Pay plugin follow these steps:
1. Log in to WordPress admin.
2. Go to Plugins > Add New.
3. Search for the GLS Pay plugin.
4. Click on Install Now, wait until the plugin is installed successfully and click on Activate.

Setup

To set up the GLS Pay you need to have an account. If you do not have an account yet please contact us on support@eligma.com. Follow the steps below to connect the plugin to your account:
1. After you have activated the GLS Pay plugin, go to WooCommerce > Settings.
2. Click the Payments tab.
3. Enter the Host, OTP and Terminal ID that you received on your email address.
4. Click Save changes.
